original_text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury, and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury: and many that were rich cast in much.
korean_text: 예수께서 헌금함을 대하여 앉으사 무리가 어떻게 헌금함에 돈 넣는가를 보실새 여러 부자는 많이 넣는데

sentences.original_text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury
and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 보물함에 돈을 넣는 것을 보셨습니다
